page.title: 04LOCAL SCHOOLS - ELLOUGHTON
page.content: Brief information about the three local county primary sdhools is as follows: Elloughton: There are 100 children on roll, 5.5 teaching staff, 6 ancillary staff, 15 secretarial hours per week, peripatetic remedial 2 hours. A kitchen provides school meals. Welton: 45 children on roll, 2.6 teaching staff, 3 ancillary staff, 10 secretarial hours and 1\ remedial hours. Meals are provided from Brough. Brough has 270 on roll, 10.2 teaching staff, 19 ancillary staff, 25 secretarial hours and 9 remedial hours. Brough has its own kitchen. Children from the primary school in the area transfer at the age of 11 to South Hunsley, the comprehensive school at Melton. There is good liaison between the secondary and primary schools.
